We up the gc ;; threshold to temporarily prevent it from running, and then reset it by the ;; `gcmh' package. (setq gc-cons-threshold most-positive-fixnum gc-cons-percentage 0.6) ;; Increase how much is read from processes in a single chunk (default is 4kb).
